review: Slow to process. I have wireless 5 feet away so it's not connection. Gets warm. Lags apps like YouTube. Oh, and now I get 20 emails asking me to rate "dora" because the kids watched it. A little disappointed on this one amazon.
author: seattle protection

review: I was a little concerned about buying this from reading the negative reviews, but I really love the firestick. I was sick of not being able to easily see my favorite tv shows or having to pay $2.99 to watch them, but with a prime membership I finally get to watch all those shows that are just not available on Netflix.  Keep in mind though, that this fire stick is ONLY worth it if you are a prime member.

review: I find that the Amazon Fire Stick is a very nice product for watching innumerable media, it has a bit of a learning curve.  My complaint is mostly that streams either get interrupted or stop sometimes, especially if you are not close within a couple of feet from your wireless access point.
